name: Cyret Technologies
tag_list: jd-edwards, oracle-e-business-suite, scm, mdm, product-mdm, vcp, crm, contact-center
overview:
Cyret Technologies, a global organization is an Oracle Gold Partner focusing exclusively on the success of customers using Oracle Solutions. Cyret’s expertise includes both reselling and implementing all of Oracle applications, specifically Oracle’s E-Business Suite, JD Edwards, CRM and Master Data Management and Supply Chain Management suite.

Why Cyret makes great services partner?

• Global organization with locations in 5 countries and servicing customers in more than 15 countries

• Various delivery and pricing models to meet your organization’s service levels and financial budget needs

• Expertise across a vast set of industries, business types and geography.

• Delivery excellence supported by a highly-skilled team of SMEs, solution architects, technology experts and program/project heads

• More than a decade of experience in implementation, license sale, upgrade and support services for large and small enterprises

Cyret’s services span across many industries and verticals across the globe. We also offer innovative and cost effective solutions like CyConnect - a Contact Center Solution and Cyret EA2 - An enterprise application appliance.

For more information about Cyret, please visit http://www.Cyret.com or write us an email at salesva@Cyret.com to arrange for a demo or presentation of our service offerings.
